verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%H7919>considereth<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> him in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H8104>preserve<s%> <S%H2421>him<s%>, and keep him alive, And he shall be <S%H833>blessed<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>; And <S%H5414>deliver<s%> not thou him unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H5582>support<s%> him upon the <S%H6210>couch<s%> of <S%H1741>languishing<s%>: Thou <S%H2015>makest<s%> all his <S%H6210>bed<s%> in his <S%H2483>sickness<s%>.
I <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H7495>me<s%>: Heal my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; For I have sinned against <S%H2398>thee<s%>.
Mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H4191>me<s%>, saying, When will he die, and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>?

And if he <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1696>me<s%>, he speaketh <S%H7723>falsehood<s%>; His <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6908>gathereth<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> to <S%H3318>itself<s%>: When he goeth <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, he telleth <S%H1696>it<s%>.
All that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H3907>whisper<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> against <S%H2803>me<s%>; Against me do they devise my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
An <S%H1100>evil<s%> <S%H1697>disease<s%>, say <S%H3332>they<s%>, cleaveth fast unto <S%H7901>him<s%>; And now that he lieth he shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%>.
Yea <S%H7965><s%>, mine own familiar <S%H376>friend<s%>, in whom I <S%H982>trusted<s%>, Who did <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H3899>bread<s%>, Hath lifted <S%H1431>up<s%> his heel against <S%H6119>me<s%>.
But <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah, have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H6965>me<s%>, and raise me up, That I may requite <S%H7999>them<s%>.
By this I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou <S%H2654>delightest<s%> in <S%H341>me<s%>, Because mine enemy doth not triumph over <S%H7321>me<s%>.
And as for <S%H8551>me<s%>, thou upholdest me in mine <S%H8537>integrity<s%>, And <S%H5324>settest<s%> me before thy <S%H6440>face<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, From <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> and to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%>. <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H543>Amen<s%>.
